summary:
This tool allow you to create custom behavior file for your model with own animation inside NIF file.

[center]Example: "Animated Dragon Wings"[/center]
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=yellow]Description:[/color][/heading]
This tool allow you to create custom behavior file for your model with own animation inside NIF file.

All you need is to fill common TXT file by proper animation names and events, and run "[color=lightblue][b]_Create_All_.bat[/b][/color]".
You will get HKX behavior file ready to use in game.

[heading][color=yellow]Examples of mods, created by using these tools:[/color][/heading]
- "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/]Animated Dragon Wings[/url]"

[heading][color=yellow]Credits:[/color][/heading]
Figment for HKXCMD tool
Developers of Notepad++
Microsoft for Visual Studio 2010 Express
Bethesda for the Skyrim

[heading][color=yellow]Permissions:[/color][/heading]
Don't change anything and don't upload it to another sites without my permission, please.
author: Anton
